description: Detects suspicious child processes of the Veeam service process. This could indicate potential RCE or SQL Injection.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Child Process Of Veeam Dabatase
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\sqlservr.exe" AND process.parent.command_line.text:"*VEEAMSQL*") AND (((process.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\wsl.exe" OR "*\\wt.exe") AND process.command_line.text:("*\-ex\ *" OR "*bypass*" OR "*cscript*" OR "*DownloadString*" OR "*http\:\/\/*" OR "*https\:\/\/*" OR "*mshta*" OR "*regsvr32*" OR "*rundll32*" OR "*wscript*" OR "*copy\ *"))) OR (process.executable.text:("*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe" OR "*\\netstat.exe" OR "*\\nltest.exe" OR "*\\ping.exe" OR "*\\tasklist.exe" OR "*\\whoami.exe"))))
